}}'''''Amon Hen'' 291''' is the two-hundred-and-ninety-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in October [[2021]].
==Contents==
*Front cover:  Tom, Bert and William by Francesco Scovacricchi
*'''2''' - From the Editor's Desk
*'''4''' - Behind Glass Doors
*'''6''' - Melkor - Free Will and Redemption by Steven Gibb
*'''7''' - Melkor by Jenna Kass
*'''10''' - Tol Fuin, Sanctuary for Evil and the final resting place of Sauron’s broken spirit by Cameron Kenneth Miller
*'''13''' - Nazgûl by Erin Goetz
*'''14''' - The Rabbit’s Revenge by Kristine Larse
*'''18''' - Centerfold: Thuringwethil by Kathrin Hei
*'''20''' - A review of Tolkien’s Switzerland by Liz Stephen
*'''22''' - Tolkien Tabletop #4: Abstract Games by David MeanS
*'''24''' - Ring Quest - 20 Years of a Tolkien Event by Alan Baxter
*'''26''' - Tolkien Tabletop...Literally! by Scott Ismail
*'''28''' - Mathom
*'''32''' - News From Fangorn
*'''34''' - All Brân
*Back cover: A Little help by Lourdes Velez
